title: The Development of instruments and their music: a symphony is recorded
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Open University and Alasdair Clayre
brief_description: Shows the rehearsal and performance of C.P.E. Bach’s Symphony in D by the Croyland Chamber Orchestra, as it was recorded for the Open University gramophone record “The Rise of the Symphony.” Examines the steps taken to achieve a musically authoritative recording of an 18th century orchestral work.
